description:
Rather than actually telling everyone that his birthday is December 9th, Keroro decides to subtly hint his way to birthday presents.  So what if no one seems to have any clue his birthday is coming up?  That just means that they`re planning a surprise party, right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bon anniversaire Keroro ! / Donaré au pays des merveilles
Keroro, Best Wishes! Happy Birthday / Moa, Moa of Mysterious Country
ケロロ 祝え! ハッピーバースデイ であります / モア 不思議の国のモア であります
